title: Rakan ban comment
body:
Seriously? Seriously? That is what I thought when I heard some fucking nerd sound like a stupid nerd doing that very stupid and annoying voice. 

The charmer? Right. Except that is what beta male nerds who never get laid sound like. That is not what a charmer sounds like.

Riot, always drifting further from reality with their decisions.

replies.body:
I'd like to say... this is in a fantasy world where it doesn't really have any... anchor in the real world. That said, if you've ever done any traveling, you'd notice Rakan's personality isn't so farfetched.

They wanted Rakan to have a sassy, distinct personality. That's all.

That said, I will admit the ban quote is annoying though, but that reaction of yours is... overly dramatic.
Its not overly dramatic. That is not a sassy voice. Nor it is the voice of someone who is a charmer. This isnt up for debate my friend, and it calls into question Riots judgement.
